game.name: Chicken Coop Invaders
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Save the chickens! Help Lucas defend the chickens against a ruthless alien attack in this frantic FPS game with Tower Defense elements! Battle through dozens of levels, make allies, buy and upgrade items!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Save the chickens! Help Lucas defend the chickens against a ruthless alien attack in this frantic FPS game with Tower Defense elements! Battle through dozens of levels, make allies, buy and upgrade items!
